directions: Whisk first 4 ingredients in small bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper.

Toss greens in large bowl with enough dressing to coat. Divide greens among 6 plates. Top with pear slices, dividing equally. Sprinkle with cheese and walnuts. Drizzle lightly with remaining dressing and serve.
ingredients: 2 large ripe pears, halved, cored, thinly sliced lengthwise
title: Baby Greens, Pear, Walnut, and Blue Cheese Salad
